tool.name: ProjScale
tool.displayname: E. Project and Scale Elevation Data

param.name: InWorkSpace
param.dialogReference: File-type workspace where the output projected and re-scaled DEM will be located.

param.name: InGrid
param.dialogReference: Name of the input grid to be re-scaled and projected.

param.name: OutGrid
param.dialogReference: Name of the re-scaled and projected output grid.

param.name: OutCoordSys
param.dialogReference: Output coordinate system that the input grid will be projected to. This should be the same as the projected hydrologic unit feature class used in 1.A. Database Setup.

param.name: OutCellSize
param.dialogReference: Output cell size in the same horizontal units as the output projection.

param.name: RegPt
param.dialogReference: Registration point, defaults to "0 0". This should be divisible by five. This allows adjacent hydrologic unit elevation and derivative grids to align properly in ArcHydro.

param.name: scaleFact
param.dialogReference: Factor to scale the input grid values by to convert it from floats to integers. This defaults to 100, but should likely be 1000 for LiDAR derived datasets in meters for increased precision.

tool.summary:
Project a NED grid to a user-specified coordinate system. Handles setting a cell registration point. Also multiplies by 100 and converts to integer grid format.

Complete documentation can be found at XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX.

idCitation.resTitle: E. Project and Scale Elevation Data
